executable.title: Compute weights of armature edges
executable.description: Compute weights of armature wedghes. Output one weight image per edge. Only the body voxels have weights.

boolean.name: InvertY
boolean.description: Whether to invert the y coordinate of the input armature
boolean.label: Invert Y Coordinates

integer.name: LastEdge
integer.description: The last egde to process (default -1 tells the program to use the largest possible)

directory.name: WeightDirectory
directory.description: The directory to contain the weight files.

integer.name: ExpansionDistance
integer.description: How far (in voxel units) to expand the diffusion region from the voronoi region.

integer.name: SmoothingIteration
integer.description: Number of smoothing iterations. This is only necessary because we restrict the solving to a local region

boolean.name: BinaryWeight
boolean.label: Binary weight
boolean.description: Use binary weight. for Debugging only

boolean.name: DumpDebugImages
boolean.description: Dump debugging images. for Debugging only
